nodes.documentation:
@notice A factory to deploy new ContestTeam contracts, and provide functionality to retrieve the deployed contracts' addresses.
@dev TODO: use struct to keep record of hackathon names, and allow implementing upgradability.
nodes.name: ContestTeamFactory

nodes.documentation: @dev emitted when a new ContestTeam contract is deployed.
nodes.name: NewContestTeamContract

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to check if team name is not empty.
nodes.name: notEmptyName

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to check if team name is unique.
nodes.name: uniqueTeamName
createTeamContract

nodes.documentation:
@notice Get a list with the addresses of the deployed contracts.
@return List of deployed contract's addresses
nodes.name: getDeployedTeamContracts

nodes.documentation:
@notice Get a contract address with the internal id.
@return An address representing a deployed contract
nodes.name: getTeamContractById

nodes.documentation:
@notice Get a contract address with the internal name.
@return An address representing a deployed contract
nodes.name: getTeamContractByName

createTeamContract(bytes32).details: The param {name} is not linked or related to the name used by a team when registering for a hackathon.

params.name: Unique team's name, used internally for identification using a human-friendly text.

getTeamContractById(uint256).return: An address representing a deployed contract

getTeamContractByName(bytes32).return: An address representing a deployed contract

createTeamContract(bytes32).notice: Creates and deploys a new ContestTeam contract.

getDeployedTeamContracts().notice: Get a list with the addresses of the deployed contracts.

getTeamContractById(uint256).notice: Get a contract address with the internal id.

getTeamContractByName(bytes32).notice: Get a contract address with the internal name.

userdoc.notice: A factory to deploy new ContestTeam contracts, and provide functionality to retrieve the deployed contracts' addresses.
